I Published An Npm Module.

ship it, dude.

I've been installing other people's npm modules for a while now. I finally published one of my own. it doesn't do much, and it's not too pretty, but it's mine, and now it can be anyone's, thanks to npm, which is a fantastic package manager. 

npm install stevetube

it scrapes the front page of youtube and shows the current videos. uses express.js, request, and jsdom.
